author: tomdz
msg: Added alterTables and getAlterTablesSql variants that allow the specification of the catalog, schema, and table types to read from the existing database (fixes DDLUTILS-65)

author: tfischer
msg: Changed behaviour for a limit of zero: (criteria.setLimit(0))
- If the db supports native limit, a limit of zero returns zero datasets.
- if the db does not support native limit, a limit of zero causes a TorqueException (thanks to village :-()
Former behaviour was: A limit of zero returns all datasets.
Added a test case for the behaviour
Added a test case checking case insensitive order by

author: tfischer
msg: Fixed case-insensitive order by for HSQLDB

author: baranda
msg: Removed remaining logic from ViewTag.doEndTag() that put in the request the dummyForm,autoscroll, etc. code. Now all this is handled directly from the ExtensionsFilter.

author: baranda
